    • setMovableFields

      public void setMovableFields​(GameScreen screen, Field srcField)
      sets the fields to movable, that match the movement pattern of the figure needs to be overriden by child classes
      Parameters:
      screen - GameScreen ui class, that contains the entire game field
      srcField - tile, from which the moves should be calculated from

    • setValidStraightLineFields

      public void setValidStraightLineFields​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Field>> directions, Field srcField)
      set the fields to movable, that are in a straight / diagonal line pattern from the figure
      Parameters:
      directions - fields in a line (one direction, e.g. X)
      srcField - tile, from which the moves should be calculated from

    • getSingleImage

      public javax.swing.ImageIcon getSingleImage​(int targetResolution)
      get ImageIcon for figure at target resolution
      Parameters:
      targetResolution - target resolution to resize the image to
      Returns:
      ImageIcon for figure
